sentences: Ana-Marija Markovina (born in Osijek, 24 April 1970) is a Croatian classical pianist.
She lives in Cologne with her husband, the psychologist Helmut Reuter, and their daughter.
Ana-Marija Markovina was born in Osijek, Croatia.
